text: Tigramuna is an Australian band active since 1993 that combines Latin-American music with jazz. Their album Jazz Latino-Americano was nominated for the 1999 ARIA Award for Best World Music Album. ==Members== *Carlos Villanueva *Wendy Upjohn *Fernando Arancibia *Craig Driscoll *Richard Ottmar *Phillip South *Andrew Robertson *Mark Taylor *Emile Nelson *Jeff Camilleri *Robbie Siracusa *Willow Neilson *Nick Southcott *Duano Martinez *Evan Mannell *Nicolas Villanueva *Marcelo Villanueva *Ednaldo Ignacio *Claudio Hevia *Marco Cavajal ==Discography== *Tigramuna (1997) - Musica Viva in Schools *Jazz Latino- Americano (1998) ==References== Category:Australian world music groups Category:Australian jazz ensembles
title: Tigramuna
